name: Weight Walker
description:
This is a small game built for Mini Jam 75. The game centers around using objects around you to unlock the exit. But those objects weigh a ton, so they'll affect your platforming ability.

Move - Left/Right 
Jump - Space Bar
Pick Up  - Up Arrow Key
Put Down - Down Arrow Key
Pause - P

At this moment the game is pretty bare, just three levels and not a lot of flair. Will try to add more post-jam.
